TEXT.TITLE: POLYDEX <POLXF> ANTI-WRINKLE INGREDIENT PATENTED
TEXT.BODY: Polydex Pharmaceuticals Ltd said a U.S. patent for an anti-wrinkle cream ingredient has been assigned to the company by its chairman, Thomas C. Usher. The company said the pantent was granted to Usher for skin permeable elastin. Reuter
